body: - Load balancer is able to choose outgoing server by checking HTTP request
- encoded URL path support in regex path rewriter
- treat HTTP 5xx responses from outgoing server as failure in circuit breaker
- dependencies update

- X-Forwarded-For rewriting fixed for older Spring versions
- dependency update
- dependencies update
- basic and bearer authentication support

- easier configuration for multiple Spring Boot profiles:
-- adding a request mapping which already exists causes its replacement
-- requet's mapping update configuration option

- circuit breaker fallback
- rate metrics
- configurable HTTP client
- custom configuration removed
- proper HTTP connection releasing

- configurable additional raw interceptors for `RestTemplate` and `WebClient`
- WebMVC `Retryer` fixed

- complete code rewrite
- Spring WebMVC and WebFlux support
- yml configuration removed
- a lot more features

- default filter order set to `Ordered.HIGHEST_PRECEDENCE`
- parsing request form data removed
- mappings available in intercoptors
- Spring Boot 2.1 support
- Customizable HTTP client in HttpClientProvider subclasses
- Customizable HTTP client in HttpClientProvider subclasses
- empty form body fixed
- async task executor bugfix
- Spring Boot 2 support

- request data available in response interceptor
- dependencies update
- custom mapping properties

- removing SSL specific headers while forwarding requests
- unnecessary `ServerProperties` bean creation removed
- dependencies update
- received response intercepting

- forwarded request intercepting
- `TraceInterceptor` as interface
- dependencies update
- mapping updates fixed

- metrics configuration fixed
- netty replaced by apache client to fix setting timeouts per mapping
- dependencies update

- SSL support

- dependencies update

- Spring Boot auto configuration added
- timeouts per mapping
- Graphite metrics reporter added
- metrics collecting on non-HTTP errors fixed
- asynchronous forwarding thread pool configuration exposed
- trace ID present in asynchronous mode

- configurable retryable errors
- choosing more specific mapping if multiple paths matches request URI

- passing request body to local web application fixed
- no mapping found trace checkpoint
- automatic mappings updates after error removed
- retrying per mapping
- forward error trace checkpoint
- tracing
- asynchronous mapping mode

- logging minor changes
- no retries by default
- separated configuration class for logging metrics reporter

- passing unmapped requests to local servlet fixed
- mappings correcting during updates fixed
- mappings updates disabled by default
- proper handling of new mappings paths added during mappings update

- named mappings
- retries logs contains mappings names
- metrics per mapping
- automatic mappings updates removed
- metrics improvements
- metrics support

- project **renamed**
- better retries logging
- full support of forwarded HTTP headers

- task scheduler creation fixed
- forward request URI dependent on servlet context path fixed

- proxy filter mapped only to mappings paths
- task scheduler creation fixed
- forward request URI dependent on servlet context path
- mappings update after error fixed
- first release
